survey_name: Adoption of AI in Small Business Customer Service Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand small business adoption and satisfaction with AI-powered customer service tools, identifying key benefits, challenges, and future needs.

questions.question_text: Does your business currently use any AI-powered tools for customer service (e.g., chatbots, automated response systems)?
answer_options: Planning to implement within the next 6 months
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for clear single-choice selection. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: Does your business currently use any AI-powered tools for customer service (e.g., chatbots, automated response systems)?
answer_options: Planning to implement within the next 6 months

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI customer service tools does your business use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Checkbox format for multi-selection. Include 'Other' with open-text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following AI customer service tools does your business use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What are the primary benefits your business has experienced from using AI in customer service?
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question with checkbox options. Randomize option order to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with randomized option display

script.question_text: What are the primary benefits your business has experienced from using AI in customer service?

questions.question_text: What challenges has your business faced when implementing AI for customer service?

script.question_text: What challenges has your business faced when implementing AI for customer service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied is your business with its current AI customer service tools?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Display as radio buttons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with horizontal scale display

script.question_text: How satisfied is your business with its current AI customer service tools?
